useCase.name: Access ingredient costs
useCase.description: Retrieve and display information regarding ingredient costs and suppliers.

preconditions.precondition: Manager is logged into the system.

successEndConditions.condition: Ingredient costs and suppliers' information successfully displayed.

failureEndConditions.condition: Unable to fetch information on ingredient costs and suppliers.

useCase.trigger: Initiate the process of checking ingredient costs.

mainSequence.step: Accesing the ingredient costs by Manager.
Manager requests ingredient cost details via the Management Interface.
The queried ingredient and supplier information is obtained from the Backend System by Management Interface.
The retrieved data is displayed through the Management Interface.
